name: chok-glosses
description: The ultimate language learning framework for passionate language learners

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace frontend && npm run copy-dist
scripts.build:deno: npm run build && npm run build:deno --workspace backend
scripts.build:express: npm run build && npm run build:express --workspace backend
scripts.copy-dist: shx rm -rf backend/dist/public && shx mkdir -p backend/dist/public && shx cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/dist/public/ && shx rm -rf frontend/dist
scripts.install:workspaces: npm install --workspace frontend && npm install --workspace backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:workspaces && shx rm package-lock.json && shx rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:workspaces: shx rm -rf frontend/dist && shx rm -rf backend/dist && shx rm -rf frontend/node_modules && shx rm -rf backend/node_modules
